definition: Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
see 生於憂患，死於安樂|生于忧患，死于安乐[sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4]
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

sentences.english: Be at rest once more, O my soul, for the Lord has been good to you.
sentences.chinese: 我的心哪，你要仍归安乐，因为耶和华用厚恩待你。

sentences.english: To euthanize unwanted pets has made his wife sick to her stomach.
sentences.chinese: 对不要的宠物进行安乐死，令他老婆很恶心。

sentences.english: The state medical examiner and chair ofanaesthesiology settled on a series of three drug injections.
sentences.chinese: 医疗审查者和麻醉学机构确定了安乐死的三个步骤。

sentences.english: Even so, any skunk captured in Illinois is euthanized.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，伊利诺伊州内捕获的臭鼬均实施安乐死。

sentences.english: The habit of worrying robs us of peace and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 忧烦的习惯夺去了我们的和平和安乐。

sentences.english: In a word, the legislation of mercy killing is suitable for gradualness .
sentences.chinese: 所以，安乐死立法宜循序渐进。

sentences.english: If ability with this whereabouts matter, the whole life is happy to allow free and unfettered.
sentences.chinese: 若能以此去处事，一生安乐任逍遥。

sentences.english: This fear confined me to a narrow comfort zone.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧心理把我局限在狭窄的安乐窝里动弹不得。

sentences.english: Everyone knows that he is only a fair-weather friend.
sentences.chinese: 人人皆知他是只能同安乐不能共患难的朋友。

sentences.english: so he wanted to pretty much euthanize her.
I recommend people to get the hell out of your comfort zone and experience the other side.
sentences.chinese: 我建议人们离开安乐窝，去到另一个世界体验一下。

sentences.english: Hapiness needs care, hardship needs patience.
sentences.chinese: 安乐需小心，忧患需耐心。

sentences.english: and want to euthanize her, you know, kill.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，那个人想让她安乐死。

sentences.english: A prince in royal purple upon a couch of ease?
sentences.chinese: 是一个穿紫袍，享受安乐的王子吗？

sentences.english: Should voluntary euthanasia &physician-assisted suicide be legalized ?
It has also been used to euthanise animals.
sentences.chinese: 它也用于动物的安乐死。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
glory, splendor, wealth and rank (idiom); high position and great wealth
